entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Periods of rain beginning near midnight then changing to periods of snow or rain before morning. Local rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain changing to periods of rain near noon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Local rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 25 April 2023
